name: Omni-Shot
description:
You got one shot, lucky for you it's a good one.

Controls: WASD to move. Mouse to aim. Left Click to Shoot.  E to recall your bullet.

Your bullet gains power the more enemy shots/enemies it defeats. You can touch your bullet to be able to fire it again.

There are 3 areas with 10 waves total.

You reach the next wave by defeating enough enemies.

Music by DocQuantum, other work done my me .   :)
